circumstances:
While flying over the Darling Range, the aircraft went out of control, enetered a dive and crashed in hilly terrain, killing all three occupants. 
Crew:
Charles Nesbit, pilot and Managing Director of Wings Ltd, 
Passengers:
William Bell, 
Mrs. Haidee Rae.
probable_cause: Inspection found that the starboard wing had separated from the airframe, caused by failure of the main spar at the root of the wing.
